TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Hbun-sinqumi, title = Hbun-sinqumi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hbun-sinqumi} }

S.FORM: Hbun-sinqumi Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Hbun-sinqumi a niyaro', 91 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 233 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 170 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 63 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 67%, Bunun 1%, Paiwan 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.

Hbon-sinqomi Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Hbon-sinqomi a niyaro', 91 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 233 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 73% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 170 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 27% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 63 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 67%, Bonon 1%, Paiwan 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'.
